sense.gloss: to refuse, to reject, to dismiss, to turn down, to decline
to inform, to give notice, to tell in advance
to ask leave, to excuse oneself (from)

sdata.j: ↑君↑↓きみ↓は、↑彼↑↓かれ↓の↑申↑↓もう↓し↑出↑↓で↓を|↑断↑↓ことわ↓る|べきだった。
sdata.e: You should have refused his offer.

sdata.j: なぜ↑彼↑↓かれ↓が↑私↑↓わたし↓の↑援助↑↓えんじょ↓を|↑断↑↓ことわ↓る|のか↑誰↑↓だれ↓にもわからない。
sdata.e: Nobody knows why he turns down my help.

sdata.j: その↑申↑↓もう↓し↑出↑↓で↓を|↑断↑↓ことわ↓る|なんて↑君↑↓きみ↓はばかだ。

sdata.e: The offer is too good to turn down.
